annotation.title: NISAR L2 GSLC Product
annotation.reference_document: D-102269 NISAR NASA SDS Product Specification Level-2 Geocoded Single Look Complex L2_GSLC

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/absoluteOrbitNumber
integer.annotation: Absolute orbit number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/trackNumber
integer.annotation: Track number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/frameNumber
integer.annotation: Frame number

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingCenter
string.annotation: Data processing center

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/granuleId
string.annotation: Unique granule identification name

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version which represents the structure of the product and the science content governed by the algorithm, input data, and processing parameters

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productSpecificationVersion
string.annotation: Product specification version which represents the schema of this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction, either "Ascending" or "Descending"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: Flag indicating if observation is nominal ("False") or urgent ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
integer.annotation: Indicates if the radar operation mode is a diagnostic mode (1-2) or DBFed science (0): 0, 1, or 2

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productLevel
string.annotation: Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the product data is in the radar geometry ("False") or in the map geometry ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representing the bounding polygon of the image. Horizontal coordinates are WGS84 longitude followed by latitude (both in degrees), and the vertical coordinate is the height above the WGS84 ellipsoid in meters. The first point corresponds to the start-time, near-range radar coordinate, and the perimeter is traversed in counterclockwise order on the map. This means the traversal order in radar coordinates differs for left-looking and right-looking sensors. The polygon includes the four corners of the radar grid, with equal numbers of points distributed evenly in radar coordinates along each edge

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingBox
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representing the bounding box of the product (the union of the geocoded grid for available frequency A and frequency B image datasets). Horizontal coordinates are WGS84 longitude followed by latitude (both in degrees), and the vertical coordinate is the height above the WGS84 ellipsoid in meters. The first point corresponds to the top left edge of the bounding box. The remaining points are traversed in counterclockwise order on the map. The fifth point closes the bounding box by repeating the first point

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Processing UTC date and time in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/radarBand
string.annotation: Acquired frequency band, either "L" or "S"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/platformName
string.annotation: Name of the platform used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/instrumentName
string.annotation: Name of the instrument used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: Nominal (or) Urgent (or) Custom (or) Undefined

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isDithered
string.annotation: "True" if the pulse timing was varied (dithered) during acquisition, "False" otherwise.

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if this product is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise.

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/compositeReleaseId
string.annotation: Unique version identifier of the science data production system

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency A

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/yCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive lines

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/xCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed range bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Processed azimuth bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of grid. Same as difference between consecutive samples in slantRange array

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction for raster layers. This is same as the spacing between consecutive entries in the zeroDopplerTime array

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/mask
integer.annotation: GSLC mask

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/HH
real.annotation: Focused SLC image (HH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/HV
real.annotation: Focused SLC image (HV)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/VH
real.annotation: Focused SLC image (VH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/VV
real.annotation: Focused SLC image (VV)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/RH
real.annotation: Focused SLC image (RH)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/RV
real.annotation: Focused SLC image (RV)

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyA/numberOfSubSwaths
integer.annotation: Number of swaths of continuous imagery, due to transmit gaps

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyB/xCoordinateSpacing

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyB/rangeBandwidth

real.annotation: Slant range spacing of grid. Same as difference between consecutive samples in slantRange array

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/grids/frequencyB/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.

annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/dataAccess
string.annotation: Location from where this product can be retrieved (URL or DOI)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/sourceDataAccess
string.annotation: Location from where the source data product can be retrieved (URL or DOI)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/staticLayersDataAccess
string.annotation: Location of the static layers product associated with this product (URL or DOI)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/ceosAnalysisReadyDataDocumentIdentifier
string.annotation: CEOS Analysis Ready Data (CARD) document identifier

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/geometricAccuracy/bias/y
real.annotation: An estimate of the localization error bias in the Y/northing direction

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/geometricAccuracy/bias/x
real.annotation: An estimate of the localization error bias in the X/easting direction

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/geometricAccuracy/standardDeviation/y
real.annotation: An estimate of the localization error standard deviation in the Y/northing direction

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/ceosAnalysisReadyData/geometricAccuracy/standardDeviation/x
real.annotation: An estimate of the localization error standard deviation in the X/easting direction

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/zeroDopplerAzimuthTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in seconds

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range in meters

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/incidenceAngle
real.annotation: Incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/elevationAngle
real.annotation: Elevation angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/groundTrackVelocity
real.annotation: Absolute value of the platform velocity scaled at the target height

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/radarGrid/heightAboveEllipsoid

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/txHorizontalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in H-transmit channel expressed as ratio txV / txH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/txVerticalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in V-transmit channel expressed as ratio txH / txV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/rxHorizontalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in H-receive channel expressed as ratio rxV / rxH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/rxVerticalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in V-recieve channel expressed as ratio rxH / rxV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/commonDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to all polarimetric channels

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/faradayRotation
real.annotation: Faraday rotation correction applied in processing

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/rfiLikelihood
real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/rfiLikelihood
real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/rfiLikelihood
real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VV/rfiLikelihood
real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RH/rfiLikelihood
real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RV/rfiLikelihood
real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RV/rfiLikelihood
real.annotation: Severity of radio frequency interference (RFI) contamination in the data. Value is in the interval [0,1], where 0: lowest severity, and 1: highest severity (or NaN if RFI detection was skipped)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to HH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to HH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to HV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to HV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to HV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to HV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to VH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to VH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to VH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to VH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VV/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to VV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VV/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to VV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/VV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to VV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to RH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to RH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to RV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RV/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to RV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RV/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to RV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/RV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to RV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/commonDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to all polarimetric channels

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/faradayRotation
real.annotation: Faraday rotation correction applied in processing

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/HH/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/HH/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/HH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to HH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/HH/scaleFactorSlope

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/VV/differentialPhase

real.annotation: Scale factor applied to VV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/VV/scaleFactorSlope

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RH/differentialPhase

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/azimuthChirpWeighting
real.annotation: 1-D array in frequency domain for azimuth processing. This is used for processing L0b to L1. FFT length=256 (assumed)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rangeChirpWeighting
real.annotation: 1-D array in frequency domain for range processing. This is used for processing L0b to L1. FFT length=256 (assumed)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/dryTroposphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the dry tropospheric correction has been applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wetTroposphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the wet tropospheric correction has been applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rangeIonosphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the range ionospheric correction has been applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/azimuthIonosphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the azimuth ionospheric correction has been applied to improve geolocation

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rfiMitigationApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if an RFI mitigation has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/ellipsoidalFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the GSLC phase has been flattened with respect to a zero height ellipsoid

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/topographicFlatteningApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the GSLC phase has been flattened with respect to topographic height using a DEM

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/snapToGridX
real.annotation: Snap to the grid along the X direction with the origin set at 0. The X-coordinate of the scene's upper-left corner is a multiple of this value

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/snapToGridY
real.annotation: Snap to the grid along the Y direction with the origin set at 0. The Y-coordinate of the scene's upper-left corner is a multiple of this value

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of geographical location

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency B

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/orbit/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/orbit/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/orbit/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/orbit/orbitType
string.annotation: Orbit product type, either "FOE", "NOE", "MOE", "POE", or "Custom", where "FOE" stands for Forecast Orbit Ephemeris, "NOE" is Near real-time Orbit Ephemeris, "MOE" is Medium precision Orbit Ephemeris, and "POE" is Precise Orbit Ephemeris

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/orbit/interpMethod
string.annotation: Orbit interpolation method, either "Hermite" or "Legendre"

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/attitude/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/attitude/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/attitude/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/attitude/attitudeType
string.annotation: Attitude type, either "FRP", "NRP", "PRP, or "Custom", where "FRP" stands for Forecast Radar Pointing, "NRP" is Near Real-time Pointing, and "PRP" is Precise Radar Pointing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file with parameters used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/demInterpolation
string.annotation: DEM interpolation method

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding
string.annotation: Geocoding algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l1SlcGranules
string.annotation: List of input L1 products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/orbitFiles
string.annotation: List of input orbit files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/tecFiles
string.annotation: List of input total electron content (TEC) files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/configFiles
string.annotation: List of input config files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/demSource
string.annotation: Description of the input digital elevation model (DEM)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version of the source data

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/productLevel
string.annotation: Source data product level. Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/productGeometry
string.annotation: Source data product geometry, either "Slant range" or "Ground range"

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Source data processing UTC date and time in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingCenter
string.annotation: Source data processing center

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file associated with the processing of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference terrain height corresponding to the source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to the source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A corresponding to the source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency B corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rfiDetection
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) detection corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rfiMitigation
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) mitigation corresponding to the source data processing information records, either "ST-EVD" or "FDNF" (or "disabled" if no RFI mitigation was applied)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rangeCompression
string.annotation: Algorithm for focusing the data in the range direction corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/elevationAntennaPatternCorrection
string.annotation: Algorithm for calibrating the antenna pattern corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rangeSpreadingLossCorrection
string.annotation: Algorithm for calibrating range fading corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/dopplerCentroidEstimation
string.annotation: Algorithm for calculating Doppler centroid corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/azimuthPresumming
string.annotation: Algorithm for regridding and filling gaps in the raw data in azimuth corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/azimuthCompression
string.annotation: Algorithm for focusing the data in the azimuth direction corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing the source data

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of the source data product

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/zeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth end time of the source data product

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction of the source data in seconds

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/numberOfAzimuthLines
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth lines within the source data product

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of polarization layers with frequency A within the source data product

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/sceneCenterAlongTrackResolution
real.annotation: Nominal along-track resolution in meters of the source data at scene center

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/rangeResolution
real.annotation: Nominal range resolution in meters of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along-track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid swath of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid swath of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/acquiredRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data acquisition range bandwidth in hertz. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to mode with largest bandwidth

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/processedRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed range bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/processedAzimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed azimuth bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed source data image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Source data slant range start distance

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of the source data in meters

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/nearRangeIncidenceAngle
real.annotation: Near-range incidence angle in degrees at the central azimuth line. The incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/farRangeIncidenceAngle
real.annotation: Far-range incidence angle in degrees at the central azimuth line. The incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

string.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of polarization layers with frequency B within the source data product

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/sceneCenterAlongTrackResolution
real.annotation: Nominal along-track resolution in meters of the source data at scene center

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/rangeResolution
real.annotation: Nominal range resolution in meters of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/sceneCenterAlongTrackSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal along-track spacing in meters between consecutive lines near mid swath of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/sceneCenterGroundRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal ground range spacing in meters between consecutive pixels near mid swath of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/acquiredRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data acquisition range bandwidth in hertz. In case of mode combination, this corresponds to mode with largest bandwidth

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/processedRangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed range bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/processedAzimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed azimuth bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed source data image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Source data slant range start distance

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of the source data in meters

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/nearRangeIncidenceAngle
real.annotation: Near-range incidence angle in degrees at the central azimuth line. The incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GSLC/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/farRangeIncidenceAngle
real.annotation: Far-range incidence angle in degrees at the central azimuth line. The incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

shape.name: scalar
shape.annotation: scalar values

shape.name: numberOfDatatakes
shape.annotation: number of datatakes in product

shape.name: numberOfObservations
shape.annotation: number of observations in product

shape.name: numberOfFrequencies
shape.annotation: Number of L-SAR frequencies in product

shape.name: yCoordinateLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in all L-SAR imagery datasets

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyAPolarizations
shape.annotation: Number of polarization layers associated with L-SAR frequency A

shape.name: frequencyAWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in all L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: numberOfSourceDataFrequencyAPolarizations
